properties.entry: SELECT TODO_NO , TODO_CONTENT , CASE WHEN SYSDATE - REG_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - REG_DATE)*24*60*60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - REG_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - REG_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - REG_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - REG_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END REG_DATE, CASE WHEN TODO_TERM - SYSDATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((TODO_TERM - SYSDATE)*24*60*60) || '초 남음' WHEN TODO_TERM - SYSDATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (TODO_TERM - SYSDATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 남음' WHEN TODO_TERM - SYSDATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (TODO_TERM - SYSDATE) * 24) || '시간 남음' WHEN TODO_TERM - SYSDATE < 7 THEN FLOOR( (TODO_TERM - SYSDATE)) || '일 남음' ELSE TO_CHAR(TODO_TERM , 'YYYY-MM-DD') END FROM AR_TODO_LIST WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO =? AND CONCLUDED_FL = 'N' AND DELETE_FL = 'N' AND (SYSDATE - TODO_TERM) < 0 ORDER BY TODO_TERM
SELECT MAX(TODO_NO) FROM AR_TODO_LIST WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ?
INSERT INTO AR_TODO_LIST VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
SELECT TODO_NO , TODO_CONTENT FROM AR_TODO_LIST WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO =? AND CONCLUDED_FL = 'N' AND DELETE_FL = 'N' ORDER BY TODO_NO
UPDATE AR_TODO_LIST SET CONCLUDED_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ? AND TODO_NO = ?
UPDATE AR_TODO_LIST SET DELETE_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ? AND TODO_NO = ?
UPDATE AR_TODO_LIST SET DELETE_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ?
SELECT TODO_NO , TODO_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE) FROM AR_TODO_LIST WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO =? AND CONCLUDED_FL = 'Y' AND DELETE_FL = 'N' ORDER BY TODO_TERM

SELECT TANK_NO, TODO_NO , TODO_CONTENT , CASE WHEN SYSDATE - TODO_TERM < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - TODO_TERM)*24*60*60) || '초 지남' WHEN SYSDATE - TODO_TERM < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - TODO_TERM) * 24 * 60) || '분 지남' WHEN SYSDATE - TODO_TERM < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - TODO_TERM) * 24) || '시간 지남' WHEN SYSDATE - TODO_TERM < 30 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - TODO_TERM)) || '일 지남' ELSE TO_CHAR(TODO_TERM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END TODO_TERM FROM AR_TODO_LIST WHERE (SYSDATE - TODO_TERM) >= 0 AND CONCLUDED_FL = 'N' AND DELETE_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY TODO_NO

SELECT TANK_NO, TODO_NO , TODO_CONTENT , CASE WHEN SYSDATE - TODO_TERM < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - TODO_TERM)*24*60*60) || '초 지남' WHEN SYSDATE - TODO_TERM < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - TODO_TERM) * 24 * 60) || '분 지남' WHEN SYSDATE - TODO_TERM < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - TODO_TERM) * 24) || '시간 지남' WHEN SYSDATE - TODO_TERM < 30 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - TODO_TERM)) || '일 지남' ELSE TO_CHAR(TODO_TERM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END TODO_TERM FROM AR_TODO_LIST WHERE (SYSDATE - TODO_TERM) >= 0 AND CONCLUDED_FL = 'N' AND DELETE_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = ? AND TANK_NO = ? ORDER BY TODO_NO
